transformations.name: NotApplicable
transformations.description: Adding N/A and Not applicable values

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		active as string,
		description as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		inserted_date as timestamp,
		pk_source_system as string,
		updated_by as string,
		updated_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StaSourceSystem
StaSourceSystem select(mapColumn(
		active,
		description,
		pk_source_system
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveUnusedColumns
RemoveUnusedColumns derive(pk_source_system = 'N/A',
		description = 'Not Applicable') ~> NotApplicable
NotApplicable aggregate(groupBy(pk_source_system),
	description = first(description)) ~> NotApplicableRow
RemoveUnusedColumns, NotApplicableRow union(byName: true)~> UnionWithNotApplicable
UnionWithNotApplicable derive(last_updated_by = 'm_pre_dim_source_system') ~> LastUpdatedBy
LastUpdatedBy sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['pre_dim_source_system.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> preDimSourceSystem
